basics.name: Santiago Klein

basics.summary: An Argentine-born computer enigneer, currently pursuing a PhD in Computer Science at Northwestern University.

location.address: Mudd Hall, Room 3416, 2233 Tech Dr 3rd Floor

work.name: MuleSoft, a Salesforce Company
work.summary: Full Stack Software Engineer in MuleSoft Anypoint Platform's API Manager Team. Developing microservices that handle more than 1M req/s. Contributed to the control plane adaptation to manage the new Flex Gateway, and the ground-zero deployment of all team managed services in Hyperforce, an AWS-based Salesforce's abstraction.
